required_fields.label: Required Fields
required_fields.helpText: List of required ticket fields separated by commas. Example: status,custom_field_1234567

hidden_fields.label: Hidden Fields
hidden_fields.helpText: List of hidden ticket fields separated by commas. Example: status,custom_field_1234567

readonly_fields.label: ReadOnly Fields
readonly_fields.helpText: List of read only ticket fields separated by commas. Example: status,custom_field_1234567

error_message: The following fields cannot be empty
